modName: FavoritesMenu cfg file for Apocalypse and Skyre
summary: updated .CFG file for Categorized Favorites Menu mod where Spell names under the right school of magic for Apocalypse Spell Package and/or Skyrim Redone
descriptionHtml:
this file is just a \"correct\" .CFG,
without this file the spell on favorite men√π will never be under the right school of magic if u are using \"Apocalypse Spell Package\" and/or \"T3nd0s Skyrim Redone\" 

 \"Categorized Favorites Menu\" <--- this must have!!  in addiction with \"Apocalypse Spell Package\" and/or \"T3nd0s Skyrim Redone\"

NOTE : THIS FILE IS THE ORIGINAL \"FAVORITEMENU.CFG\" THAT IS IN CATEGORIZED FAVORITE MENU MOD BUT WITH SPELLS UPDATED........SO I RECOMMEND TO CHECK BEFORE OVERWRITE IF U HAVE A CUSTOM \"FAVORITEMENU.CFG\" OF YOUR OWN

you can find the file under your skyrim folder/data/interface if u have Categorized Favorites Menu installed

below the mods:
Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862
and
T3nd0s Skyrim Redone by T3nd0
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286
and / or 
Apocalypse Spell Package by Enai Siaio
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16225
author: Archsage
